text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O managed to finish the 
Twinkle Series in style.

We were able to get through the very 
important "first three years" together――

One day, I was basking in the afterglow 
of such a big milestone.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You there! 
The campus is off-limits to everyone except students and faculty!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I am aware! It was a joke!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I would never mistake my Trainer, you 
know～!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now that's exactly what I call a typical class 
president joke!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What do you think? Isn't it just marvelous 
that I'm not only serious, but I can also 
appreciate a good joke!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As expected, you know exactly what I'm 
talking about!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This is just another sign that I've grown up 
with you, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well, so much for standing around and 
idle chatter! 
I've got work to do as class president, after 
all!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Looking around to see if there are any 
young pupils slacking off, helping the 
teacher, cleaning the blackboard eraser…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There's so much to do! But, when all of my 
duties are complete…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It'll be time for the long-awaited, much 
anticipated! 
Training with the Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Please do wait patiently for me on the 
course. 
Because I'll be back to finish it off, 
Bakushin-style!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Come on, come on, just as we always do!! 
Let's go for this great, big, awesome 
dream!!
